{"city": "El Sobrante", "state": "CA", "name": "Mobile Pantry Distribution", "address": "4660 Appian Way,", "phone": "925-642-2651", "notes": "Partner Agency Volunteer Partner Agency Volunteer Search About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate Search About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate Partner Agency Volunteer Partner Agency Volunteer Get Food El Sobrante Printer Friendly List Mobile Pantry Distribution Families and individuals can pick up FREE fresh produce, proteins, dairy and a variety of nonperishable food once or twice a month. Please choose ONE location. Moose Lodge #550 , 4660 Appian Way, El Sobrante , Last Friday 10:00am-12:00pm. Partner Food Pantry Pantries provide FREE food to the public. Please note: Each pantry has its own guidelines. Check with them about specific eligibility requirements and pick-up limits. Appian Way Seventh-day Adventist Church (Drive-Thru), 980 Appian Way Bldg A, El Sobrante , Wednesday 10:00am-12:00pm.
							Please create space in trunk for food boxes/produce. Phone: 925-642-2651 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Salvation Army El Sobrante , 4600 Appian Way, El Sobrante , Thursday 10:00am-12:00pm & 1:00-2:30pm. Phone: 510-262-0500 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. St. Callistus Catholic Church (SVdP) , 3580 San Pablo Dam Rd, El Sobrante , Monday & Thursday 11:00am-12:00pm. Phone: 510-243-7501 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Senior Food Program FREE groceries twice a month to individuals aged 55 or older who meet income guidelines. Only one senior per household can receive food. Bring a picture ID and proof of address (PG&E bill, for example). Moose Lodge #550 , 4660 Appian Way, El Sobrante , 1st & 3rd Friday 10:00-11:00am. Printer Friendly List Locations Concord: 925-676-7543 4010 Nelson Ave
Concord, CA 94520 Fairfield: 707-421-9777 2370 N Watney Way
